name: SciLifeLab Data Repository
description: The SciLifeLab Data Repository, powered by Figshare and maintained by the Data Centre, is a repository for publishing any kind of research-related data, e.g. documents, figures, or presentations. Through an agreement with Figshare, SciLifeLab offers researchers and units the opportunity to upload and publish their research data through a dedicated portal.

name: SciLifeLab Data Stewardship Wizard
description: Data Stewardship Wizard (DSW) is a tool to aid the creation of data management plans. This is a custom instance of the tool adapted to life science research in Sweden run by the SciLifeLab Data Platform and NBIS.

name: SciLifeLab Serve (& Compute)
description: SciLifeLab Serve is a service under development for model and app deployment offered to life science researchers in Sweden. Currently, the service is accepting pilot users. SciLifeLab Serve allows to serve Tensorflow models, PyTorch models, Dash apps, general Python models, and R Shiny apps.
